K2-noise documentation
======================

So, you want some K2 lightcurves but without all of the systematic noise? Come join our quixotic adventure to *infer* the stellar lightcurve. If that doesn't convince you, how about dropping the word **Bayesian**!?!

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
